review: I found out that I am unable to download certain apps like HuluPlus, YouTube, and CW. It either cannot find it or will not download at all. The Roku is so much easier to use and has more apps available that actually work. I thought it was funny when I was watching the Amazon fire stick video instructions that it actually showed HuluPlus and YouTube on the home screen.
author: Jesse

review: I found out how to open the sub-titles and now everything is going great. Thanks.
author: Kenneth A. Maxey

review: Only used for a couple of days. The response time is great. Still confused about what I can watch for free with my Amazon Prime account vs. what I have to rent. I still struggle with navigating through so many video choices.
author: David Quiel

review: We love it. Easy to use. Great price too.
author: Faith E.

review: Having problems with it freezing and buffering a lot.  Have to pull the plug to reset it.
author: Doug Broek

review: I was a little surprised how easy this was to get started and how great it works. I finally got to watch "Band of Brothers" series and it was like having my own theater
author: Amazon Customer

review: I love it. Now I can watch YouTube on the television and view my prime videos as well as look at my photos saved to the cloud.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Plugged it in and it works perfectly, much to my surprisel, as my last gizmo, Chrome Bar was a dud.  Thank you very much.  Great price
author: Richard L. Bracamonte
